computer_science.name: Computer Science
computer_science.description: The Computer Science department offers comprehensive programs in software development, algorithms, and computing systems.

CS101.title: Introduction to Programming
CS101.description: Fundamental programming concepts using Python. Variables, control structures, functions, and basic data structures.

CS201.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
CS201.description: Implementation and analysis of fundamental data structures and algorithms. Arrays, linked lists, trees, sorting, and searching.

CS301.title: Database Systems
CS301.description: Database design, SQL, normalization, transactions, and database administration.

CS401.title: Software Engineering
CS401.description: Software development lifecycle, design patterns, testing, and project management.

business_administration.name: Business Administration
business_administration.description: Comprehensive business education covering management, finance, marketing, and operations.

BUS101.title: Introduction to Business
BUS101.description: Overview of business functions, entrepreneurship, and the global business environment.

BUS201.title: Principles of Management
BUS201.description: Management theories, leadership, organizational behavior, and decision-making.

BUS301.title: Marketing Management
BUS301.description: Marketing strategies, consumer behavior, market research, and digital marketing.
